alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko; Noble; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Noble, northern Whitley and east central Kosciusko Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tri-lakes, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph along with heavy downpours. Road ponding and localized nuisance flooding is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Columbia City around 725 PM EDT. Tri-lakes around 730 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Churubusco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
